price: Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Ɛmma monsuro, efrisε Meka mo ho, Mete na Mehunu nso.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
